EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to OGC Attorney that the agreement has been submitted for the OGC review.
EmailTemplate.name: License Email notification to OGC Attorney - OGC Review using HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - OGC Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!EPA_Agreement__c.OGC_Attorney__c},
EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9} is ready for OGC Review. Please email FTTA@epa.gov with any questions.
To access the agreement, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.Link}
Thank you.
